text: If you're not investing, you're not doing it right, especially if the goal is to create wealth earlier in your life. If your primary method is saving, you're gonna be saving for a real, real long time. But the entire purpose of investing is to accelerate that timeframe by accepting a little bit more risk, we can still be very methodical about what risk we choose to take. But if you're not investing, it's gonna take way longer than it needs to. Start investing, be an outliner ceileter.
